verb.description: Interfere with (something) in order to cause damage or make unauthorized alterations.
examples: someone tampered with the brakes on my car

verb.description: Exert a secret or corrupt influence upon (someone).

noun.description: A person or thing that tamps something down, especially a machine or tool for tamping down earth or ballast.

origin: Mid 16th century (in the sense busy oneself to a particular end, machinate): alteration of the verb temper.
